original_text: Was he not held in greater honor than the Three? He became their commander, even though he was not included among them.
korean_text: 그는 세 사람 중에 가장 존귀한 자가 아니냐 그가 그들의 우두머리가 되었으나 그러나 첫 세 사람에게는 미치지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: Was he not held in greater honor
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 더 큰 영광을 받지 않았던가

sentences.original_text: even though he was not included among them.
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그가 그들 중에 포함되지 않았음에도 불구하고
